00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "MetricWeight.hpp"
00035 #include "ElemSampleQM.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 MetricWeight::~MetricWeight() {}
00041 
00042 
00043 double MetricWeight::get_weight( PatchData& pd, 
00044                                  size_t element,
00045                                  Sample sample,
00046                                  MsqError& err )
00047 {
00048   size_t h = ElemSampleQM::handle( sample, element );
00049   double value;
00050   bool flag = mMetric->evaluate( pd, h, value, err );
00051   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00052   if (!flag) {
00053     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid metric value canot be used as target weight", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00054     return 0.0;
00055   }
00056   
00057   return value;
00058 }
00059
